body:
I enjoy making my own trees in Minecraft, although I'm pretty new at it, I'd thought I'd show yous what I did.

Screenshot
Video

title: I made a custom tree. Thoughts?

replies.body: Looks sort of lopsided. Tho I assume it's meant to be
replies.body_tagged: Looks sort of lopsided. Tho I assume it's meant to be

replies.body: Yea I was kinda going for that look where it arches over a bit.
replies.body_tagged: Yea I was kinda going for that look where it arches over a bit.

reply_to.body: Looks sort of lopsided. Tho I assume it's meant to be
reply_to.body_tagged: Looks sort of lopsided. Tho I assume it's meant to be

replies.body: Give it some branches, you don't usually see trees that are just trunks with leaves on them. I like the arching design.
replies.body_tagged: Give it some branches, you don't usually see trees that are just trunks with leaves on them. I like the arching design.

replies.body:
What badger said
It mostly looks like a bunch of leaves arching to the side
replies.body_tagged:
What badger said

replies.body:
Looks like a floppy catapillar and also a *insert you know what here*.

But if you do what Badger said it'd be very good.
replies.body_tagged:

But if you do what Badger said it'd be very good.

replies.body:
You dont make lopsided or whatever leaning trees on the side when they are fully full of leaves

Make branches and lower the amount of leaves at the bottom so you can see the wood only, this ill give a much better feeling of the lean
